title: Immune Boost Capsules
description: Natrol®'s Immune Boost Capsules support a strong immune system using the clinically tested super food EpiCor®. Get Immune Boost Capsules with Natrol.
cleaned_text: Immune Boost CapsulesDaily maintenance for stronger immune health Description Natrol's Immune Boost Formula supports a strong immune system using the clinically tested super food EpiCor® in combination with high potency immune supporting supplements Vitamin C, Vitamin D-3, Selenium and Zinc. The stronger and healthier your immune system, the better you and your family are able to fight off daily challenges. increase the activity of Natural Killer cells and other immune cells in healthy adults. Natural Killer cells are part of the body's natural immune defense. EpiCor® also supports the body's production of the antibody IgA, found in mucous membranes, which is an integral part of the body's first line of defense. Immune Boost Formula Benefits: Safe for Adults and Children ages 9 and older. Tips for Kids: Sprinkle the contents of one capsule into their favorite food. Keep your body strong throughout the year with Natrol's Immune Boost. Made with clean ingredients *Products may vary Supplement Facts Serving Size: 1 Capsule Servings Per Container: 30 Amount Per Serving %DV Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid) Vitamin D-3 (as Cholecalciferol) Zinc (from Zinc Oxide) Selenium (from SelenoExcell® Yeast-Bound Selenium) EpiCor® Super Food Yeast Complex
